duties_responsibilities.duty: Advise clients on a full spectrum of tax services including structuring and modeling, succession planning, wealth transfer planning, and tax compliance.
Manage and oversee the engagement team focused on entity, individual, fiduciary, and gift/estate taxation.
Collaborate with specialists regarding estate and gift planning, state and local taxation, and international taxation.
Provide leadership, training, and career mentorship to staff and supervisor level team members.
Drive growth opportunities with existing clients and prospects and sustain strong client relationships.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in accounting or business-related field, J.D., LL.M. in taxation and/or Masters in Taxation
